mapper.select: SELECT user_id as userId, nickname, profile_image_url AS profileImageUrl FROM users WHERE user_id = #{userId}

SELECT u.user_id AS userId, u.nickname, u.status_message AS statusMessage, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM friends WHERE status = 'ACCEPTED' AND (first_user_id = #{userId} OR second_user_id = #{userId}) ) AS friendNum u.joined_at AS joinedAt FROM users u WHERE u.user_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users (username, password, nickname, joined_at) VALUES (#{username}, #{password}, #{nickname}, #{joinedAt})
